title: Muffin by helicopter
brief_description: An episode of the children’s television show “Muffin the Mule” starring Annette Mills on piano and the puppets Muffin the Mule, Oswald the Ostrich, Grace the Giraffe and Peregrine Esq the Penguin. Muffin the Mule returns for a trip to France with a surpprise for Annette - a little giraffe called Grace.
